This is a collection of some projects related to data wrangling and plotting.

* [Birthdays and Holidays](birthdays.html) Analyzes the relationship between birthdays and holidays.
* [Bicycle Rentals](bicycle.html) Analyzes times of bicycle rentals.
* [A graph for the Economist](economist.html) Recreates a graph from the Economist.
* [Word on the Street](street.html) Analyzes common words in street names.
* [Scraping Nuclear Reactors](nuclear.html) An example of webscraping.
